text: Paul Löbe (14 December 1875 – 3 August 1967) was a German politician and member of the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD), who served as President of the Reichstag. Category:1875 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Weimar Republic politicians Category:Members of the Reichstag (Weimar Republic) Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany Category:Prussian politicians
title: Paul Löbe
